name: Clustecl
summary: Clustecl (Alteration) aus dem AD&D 2e Player's Handbook.

source_text.raw_block:
Clustecl (Alteration)
Range: Touch
Components: V, S, M
Duration: Permanent
Casting Time: 8
Area of Effect: Object touc..ed
Saving Throw: None
The glassteel spell turns normal, non-
magical crystal or glass into a transparent
substance that has the tensile strength and
unbreakability of actual steel. Only a rela-
tively small volume of material can be
affected, a maximum weight of 10 pounds
per level of experience of the spellcaster, and
it must form one whole object. The Armor
Class of the substance is 1.
The material components of this spell are
a small piece of glass and a small piece of
steel.

spell_card.name: Clustecl
spell_card.description_excerpt: The glassteel spell turns normal, non- magical crystal or glass into a transparent substance that has the tensile strength and unbreakability of actual steel. Only a rela- tively small volume of material can be affected, a maximum weight of 10 pounds per level of experience of the spellcaster, and it must form one whole object. The Armor Class of the substance is 1. The material components of this spell are a small piece of glass and a small piece of steel.
